name: sharQNetwork
tag_list: recruitment, career-fairs, headhunting, employment, careers, college-graduates, entry-level-positions
overview:
sharQNetwork is a Virtual Career Fair that aims to revolutionize the recruitment market.

sharQNetwork.com was founded by Amir Andre Savar after graduating from Pepperdine University in the Spring of 2011. Upon entering the job market he found the job-hunt and employee acquisition for entry level positions to be inefficient and ultimately ineffective.

The sharQNetwork, actively recruits top talent from America’s best Universities creating a highly competitive, intelligent and impressive network of college students/recent graduates seeking employment/internship opportunities. For a small fee employers are able to access the network by posting Career/Internship opportunities directly on the site; interested parties apply directly for any desired position.
